h2_title: Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide
content: Thankfully, the attacks won't vary hugely here so you should be familiar with them at this stage. But you will need to keep shifting your attention between the two enemies as each one takes the lead.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Stone_Monkey.md', within the main section titled 'The Stone Monkey', specifically from the subsection 'Stone Monkey Boss Fight and Guide' and the sub-subsection 'Stone Monkey Phase Two'.
The content is as follows:
Thankfully, the attacks won't vary hugely here so you should be familiar with them at this stage. But you will need to keep shifting your attention between the two enemies as each one takes the lead.
